title: Hana no Aru Seikatsu
sinopse:
"Iyokawa, your nipples are way too amazing. Satisfying yourself with that cute voice, you asshole. Help me get rid of this erection somehow?"

"Senpai...although you're always being nice to me, sorry for thinking you were sexually harassing me..."

An eternally horny couple's perverted love comedy!!
